workflow.name: Send package and visitor alerts with Slack, SMS, email, Google Sheets and Claude
workflow.description:
## Who this is for

Property management teams handling multiple properties with high package/visitor traffic who want automated tenant and management notifications.

## What this workflow does

Automatically classifies package and visitor events, sends notifications to tenants, alerts property managers, and logs activity for accountability.

## How it works

1. Package/visitor system triggers workflow.
2. AI classifies urgency and type.
3. Notifications sent via Email, SMS, and Slack.
4. Google Sheets logs all events.
5. Optional AI follow-up suggestions for unclaimed packages or missed visitors.

## How to set up

Connect Webhook, Slack, Email, SMS, and AI. Test routing and logging. Adjust AI prompts for local building protocols.

## Requirements

- AI Node
- Webhook from package/visitor system
- Slack, Email, SMS credentials
- Google Sheets

Built by QuarterSmart. Created by Hyrum Hurst.

workflow.name: Package and Visitor Arrival Notification System

parameters.html:

Urgent {{ $json.isVisitor ? "Visitor" : "Package" }} Notification

Dear {{ $json.tenantName }},

You have a high-priority {{ $json.isVisitor ? "visitor" : "package" }} waiting for you.

Details:

  • Building: {{ $json.building }}
  • Type: {{ $json.packageType }}
  • Arrival Time: {{ $json.arrivalTime }}
  • Description: {{ $json.description }}
  • Urgency Reason: {{ $json.reason }}

Please collect this {{ $json.isVisitor ? "visitor" : "package" }} as soon as possible.

Thank you,
Property Management

{{ $json.isVisitor ? "Visitor" : "Package" }} Arrival Notification

Dear {{ $json.tenantName }},

You have a {{ $json.isVisitor ? "visitor" : "package" }} waiting for you at the front desk.

Details:

  • Building: {{ $json.building }}
  • Type: {{ $json.packageType }}
  • Arrival Time: {{ $json.arrivalTime }}
  • Description: {{ $json.description }}

You can collect it at your convenience during office hours.

Thank you,
Property Management
parameters.subject: ={{ $json.isVisitor ? "Visitor" : "Package" }} Arrival Notification - {{ $json.building }}

parameters.message: =URGENT: {{ $json.isVisitor ? "Visitor" : "Package" }} waiting at {{ $json.building }}. Type: {{ $json.packageType }}. Please collect ASAP. - Property Management

parameters.text: =Package/Visitor: {{ $json.packageType }} for {{ $json.tenantName }} at {{ $json.building }}. Urgency: {{ $json.urgency }}. Arrival: {{ $json.arrivalTime }}. Current time: {{ $now }}

messageValues.message:
You are a property management assistant that suggests follow-up actions for unclaimed packages or missed visitors.

Analyze the package/visitor information and current time to determine if follow-up is needed:

**Suggest follow-up if:**
- High urgency items unclaimed for more than 2 hours
- Regular items unclaimed for more than 24 hours
- Visitors waiting for more than 30 minutes
- Perishable items unclaimed for more than 1 hour

**Follow-up suggestions may include:**
- Send reminder notification to tenant
- Call tenant directly
- Contact emergency contact
- Arrange for package refrigeration (perishables)
- Reschedule visitor appointment
- Return package to sender

Provide a brief recommendation with reasoning, or state "No follow-up needed" if the timeframe is acceptable.

parameters.content:
## Main

This workflow automatically tracks incoming packages and visitor arrivals, notifies tenants via email/SMS, alerts property managers via Slack, and logs everything for reporting.

## Setup

1. Connect your package/visitor system to Webhook trigger.
2. Add credentials for Slack, Email, SMS, and AI.
3. Customize AI classification prompts for package urgency.
4. Test notification routing for tenants and management.
5. Adjust logging and reporting as needed.

user.name: Hyrum Hurst
user.bio: Google Certified AI Automations Engineer, Agentic Workflow Specalist
